title: Collaborative Surgery Simulator
description: Prototype of a multi-user environment simulator for lipoma extraction surgery, with some of its features including:
bulletItems: Online Multiplayer system where each user can choose a specific role (surgeon, assistant, resident, etc) and chat through a voice chat feature.

title: UNO 3D
description: Videogame of the popular card game UNO, but in a 3D immersive version.

title: Cookies Game
description: Single player game, where the user has to collect as many cookies as possible in a short time while avoiding obstacles

title: Jumping Game
description: Based on Google's Dinosaur Game where the player has to dodge obstacles and last as long as possible.
bulletItems: Control by voice commands (english or spanish) or keyboard.
